price: Anaasε ͻsoro ne asaase ne deε εwͻ mfinfii no ahennie no wͻ wͻn? (Sε εwͻ wͻn deε a,) εneε wͻnfa kwan bi so mforo (nkͻ soro hͻ).
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُم مُّلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَلۡيَرۡتَقُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am lahum mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā falyartaqū fī al-asbābi
